rows.label: tlk70000005_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, I really hope me and
Freja-chan can go exploring
in the city some day.

rows.label: tlk70000005_05_msg0002
rows.name:
We'd see all the sights, go
shopping, and then stop for
treats in a fancy caf√©.

rows.label: tlk70000005_05_msg0003
rows.name:
There's so many places I want to go in
town that I'd have a hard time deciding.
But Freja-chan's even worse than me!

rows.label: tlk70000005_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Even when she knows what
she wants to do, she doesn't
know where to start.

rows.label: tlk70000005_05_msg0005
rows.name:
She was really happy that time
you guys helped her out though.

rows.label: tlk70000005_05_msg0006
rows.name:
So, I just want to say
thanks again to all of you.
I really appreciate it.

rows.label: tlk70000005_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Things are really great
right now. I hope the
future is just as bright!
